work.title: Software Engineering Intern
work.description: Intern on the Cross-Asset Solutions - Linked Notes Structuring desk.

work.title: Software Engineering Intern
work.description:
Developed multiple internal tools and applications on the .NET framework, mainly interacting with the BMO Mesh network.
Automated several manual Excel pricing calculation tasks, now using .NET automation tasks, to increase the speed and efficiency of the in-house workflow.
Developed a dependency graph similar to the Microsoft Excel algorithm to create and manage an implied market for Canadian bonds using real-time prices.
Used recursive solutions, event-based solutions, and graphing techniques to lower the memory and CPU usage of graph updates.
Employed real-time programming techniques to ensure the product functioned under critica time & resource constraints.
